# File couchdb/table.rb, line 63
    def parse_table(doc)
      array = []
      @id = doc.root.attribute(:id).to_s
      doc.elements.each("#{Str_Table}/#{Str_Tr}"){|tr|
        val = parse_tr(tr)
        #puts "Setting #{field_name} to '#{val}' (type of #{val.class.name})" 
        array << val
      }
      array
    end
